Title: How to Scale and Advance a Bold Vision with Lauren Letta
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Lauren Letta. Lauren is the former COO of charity: water, an incredible nonprofit organization that brings clean drinking water to people in developing countries. She shares how she took the bold vision of charity: water’s CEO Scott Harrison and converted it into an organizational structure for building their team. Later in the episode, George sits down with Daniel Ramsey, the executive vice president of EntreLeadership. Daniel shares the desired future framework we use at Ramsey Solutions and explains how you can use it to rally your team around your company’s vision.

 

You’ll learn:

  • Why Lauren Letta left fashion to join charity: water
  • What key hires you need to get to the next level
  • Why you might want to start a bagel breakfast meeting
  • How to focus your team
